title: UCCS College of Business Dean's Innovation Fund
description: To provide support to be used at the discretion of the Dean of the College of Business for innovation in curriculum design and delivery, research and scholarship innovation, and innovation in external engagement, service, and outreach activities.
marketingContent: To provide support to be used at the discretion of the Dean of the College of Business for innovation in curriculum design and delivery, research and scholarship innovation, and innovation in our external engagement, service, and outreach activities.
